description:
# Monday

Monday.com desktop client now in Chocolatey package!

This client works for all Monday.com editions, including free, however each plans has its limits, those can be checked on the oficial website

To use this application, after install, on first opening it will ask for users credentials, so a Monday account is required


# Installation

This Chocolatey package directly downloads the installer from the official website, performs a Checksum on said package and after validating it performs the installation in silent mode
author: Monday.com
